LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Abhorrent.stages.harveste: I had to harvest someone's organ. It's an abhorrent violation of everything I believe.
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Horrible.stages.harvested: I had to harvest someone's organ. It's a horrible offense against my beliefs.
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.stage: Someone took body parts from our fellow. It's a horrible thing.
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Know_Horrible_Mood.stages: Someone took body parts from our fellow. It's a horrible thing.
LanguageData.InstalledOrgan_Abhorrent.stages.installe: I had to install an organ in someone. It's an abhorrent violation of everything I believe.
LanguageData.InstalledOrgan_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.stage: Someone installed an organ. The body should be sacrosanct!
I had to sell someone's organ. I don't approve of such transactions.
LanguageData.SoldOrgan_Know_Horrible_Mood.stages.orga: Someone sold an organ. It's horrible to trade human parts like machinery.
LanguageData.TradedOrgan_Abhorrent.stages.traded_orga: I had to trade someone's organ. It's an abhorrent violation of everything I believe.
LanguageData.TradedOrgan_Know_Abhorrent_Mood.stages.o: Someone traded an organ! What an abhorrent, disgusting act.
